title: b. Club creates questionnaire and Admin reviews it
custom_preconds:
Stay logged in as a Club in one browser.

In a different browser, login as a Questionnaire Admin:

https://prospectlinkstg.mlb.com/prospect/saml/login
user: test-questionnaireadmin@mlb.com
pw: Summer1!
custom_steps:
As Club, create a questionnaire with 2 pages.
Verify the Acknowledgement text is present.
Add every type of question, including follow-up.
Make sure steppers and sliders can accept an increment of 1.
Edit the page titles of each page.
Click View Questionnaire and review.
Close out of the View popup.
Click Submit.
Try to open the questionnaire again - it should be View only.

As Q.Admin, click Review Questionnaires.
Find the newly created questionnaire.
Verify its status and click to view it.
Add comments.
Reject the questionnaire.
Try to open the questionnaire again - it should be View only.

As Club, refresh page and open the rejected questionnaire.
Click Make Changes.
Add replies to the comments.
Add another question.
Delete a question.
Click Submit.

As Q.Admin, refresh page and open the submitted questionnaire.
Look at the Changes history and verify your changes appear.
Approve the questionnaire.

As Club, refresh page and open the approved questionnaire.
Push it live.
Try to open the questionnaire again - it should be View only.

As Q.Admin, try to open the questionnaire again - it should be View only.

Stay logged in as Club.
You can log out as Q.Admin.

title: d. Club checks Prospect's progress
custom_preconds: Return to the browser where you're logged in as a Club.
custom_steps:
Check the Draft Year Activity feed - verify that Prospect's completion of Profile and other tasks appear.
Go to the Prospects page.
Find that Prospect.
Click on Prospect's name and verify that Profile information appears in a popup.
Click through the popup pages, checking information.
Close popup.
Check that Prospect's record is marked "No unfinished items"

title: f. Club invites Prospects using a spreadsheet
custom_preconds: You are logged in as a Club.
custom_steps:
Navigate to the Prospects page.
Download a .csv template.
Complete it with multiple entries. Include some mistakes, like past draft years.
Upload the template.
Verify that a popup allows you to download the entries with errors.
Download, correct the entries, and upload.
Verify that all the entries appear on the Prospects page.

title: g. Club re-invites prospects and sends questionnaires
custom_preconds: You are logged in as a Club.
custom_steps:
Navigate to the Prospects page.
Use a stoplight menu to re-invite a Prospect who has not signed up.
Use a stoplight menu to send a questionnaire to a Prospect.
Use checkboxes to select multiple Prospects.
Use the blue footer bar to re-invite those Prospects.

title: h. Club creates a questionnaire by copying an old one
custom_preconds: You are logged in as a Club.
custom_steps:
Click to Create a questionnaire.
On the popup, select the Copy toggle.
Choose a previous questionnaire to copy.
Change the buttons until you have a type of questionnaire that already exists.
Verify that the submit button is disabled.
Hover over the button and verify that explanation popup appears.
Change the buttons until the submit button is enabled.
Create the questionnaire.
Edit and add to it to make sure it functions like any other questionnaire.

title: i. Club deactivates a questionnaire
a. Club invites Prospects to join DP
custom_preconds:
Login as a Club Scout:

https://prospectlinkstg.mlb.com/prospect/saml/login

user: test@dbacks.com
pw: Summer1!
custom_steps:
Navigate to the Prospects page.
Click on the plus button.
Complete invitation fields for 2 prospects - use email addresses you can access (e.g., your gmail account).
(especially note their Names, Draft Years, and States for your use later).
Add a row at the bottom.
Click Send Invitations.
Verify success popup.

On the Prospects page, search for their names.
Click the X in the search field to restore all prospects.
Filter prospects by Draft Year and State to find your new invitees.
Clear all filters.
Use pagination to navigate.
Click on pagination summary to change view of rows.

Stay logged in as this user.

In another browser, login as another club:
test@orioles.com
Summer1!
Check that the DBacks-invited prospect does NOT appear in the Orioles prospects list.
Logout.

Clear cache and login as Central Office.
test-centraloffice@mlb.com
Summer1!
Check that the Club-invited prospects DO appear in the BOC Prospects list.
Logout.

title: c. Prospect signs up and completes tasks
custom_preconds:
You are logged in as a Club in one browser.

In a different browser, clear cache.
Open your email account used for inviting prospects.
custom_steps:
Verify that invitations from the Club have arrived.
Accept an invitation.
Complete signup page.
Login (username is the email address).
If for some reason login page does not appear, use https://prospectlinkstg.mlb.com/#/login

On the DP site:
Watch the video, use the buttons and progress bar.
Click to edit profile.
Verify profile page appears.
Save and Exit (accept any warning).
Return to dashboard.

On dashboard:
Click on each Resource. They should open in new tabs (except the video, which opens in a popup).
Click on Contact Us email, prospectlink@mlb.com. It should open your Mail app on your computer.
Click on Alerts.
Verify that there are alerts about completing the profile and questionnaire with due dates.

Click on Profile.
Complete half of it.
Save and exit, return to dashboard.
Verify that progress percentage and number of questions completed have changed.
Click on User Name to get dropdown.
Click Edit Profile.
Complete Profile to 100%.
Return to dashboard.
Verify that Profile is now the last item in the list.
Verify that progress percentage and number of questions completed have changed.
Sign a waiver.
Complete a questionnaire but do not submit.
Return to dashboard.
Verify that progress percentage and number of questions completed have changed.
Submit questionnaire.

Stay logged in as this Prospect on this browser.

title: e. BOC creates alerts and Prospect views them
custom_preconds:
You are logged in as a Club in one browser and a Prospect in another browser.

In a 3rd browser, log in as BOC:

https://prospectlinkstg.mlb.com/prospect/saml/login
username: test-centraloffice@mlb.com
pw: Summer1!
custom_steps:
As BOC, click on username to get dropdown.
Click on Announcements.
Create 2 new announcements and publish them, using special characters, numbers, and uc/lc (in text only, header is uc only).

As Prospect, click on Alerts.
Verify that the new announcements appear.

As BOC, navigate to Announcements again.
Edit both announcements and publish.

As Prospect, refresh page and click Alerts.
Verify that the edits appear.

As BOC, navigate to Announcements.
Clear one announcement.

As Prospect, refresh page and click Alerts.
Verify that the remaining announcement is still there.

As BOC, clear the other announcement.

As Prospect, refresh page and click Alerts.
"No new alerts" should appear in the Announcements section.

As BOC, create 2 new announcements and publish.

As Prospect, refresh page and click Alerts.
Verify that the 2 new announcements are there.

As BOC, change the date of one announcement so that it's in the past, and publish.

As Prospect, refresh page and click Alerts.
Verify that the changed announcement is now in the Past section.

As Prospect, click on user name for dropdown.
Click on Sign out.
Login page should appear.

title: j. BOC deletes a Prospect
BOC/Club invites Prospect
Prospect signs up
Prospect completes Profile
Prospect completes HIPAA Waiver
Prospect completes General Questionnaire
Prospect completes Medical Questionnaire
Visual regression across all platforms
custom_preconds:
Automated tests do not pick up on visual bugs, so visual regression must be done manually.

This process uses these platforms only (most users use Windows Chrome):
Mac: Chrome 68, Firefox 62, Safari 11
Windows 10: Chrome 68, Firefox 62, IE 11

title: Prospect browses for files to upload
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Prospect selects Documents in the top nav
AND the Documents screen loads
custom_steps:
WHEN Prospect clicks on the Browse for Files button
AND WHEN browser popup appears to allow Prospect to choose files
AND WHEN Prospect selects files and submits
custom_expected:
THEN the file name appears in the Uploaded Files section of the Documents screen.

AND WHEN BOC/Club logs in and view Prospect's profile
THEN file appears in Documents section.

custom_expected:

custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on the stoplight menu
AND dropdown shows Request Management and Request Additional Information
AND user clicks Request Management
custom_expected:
THEN the Request Management popup appears.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/20164)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/20163)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/20162)

title: BOC/Club - Request Management - user closes a request
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC/Club is viewing the Request Management popup
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks Close for an item
AND WHEN Prospect logs in
AND Prospect views Documents screen
custom_expected:
THEN Closed Requests in sidebar show the item just closed.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/20165)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/20166)

title: BOC/Club - Request Management - declines match Prospect's selections
custom_preconds: GIVEN that BOC/Club is viewing the Request Management popup
custom_expected:
THEN the Declined items match the Prospect's selections.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/20167)

title: BOC/Club - Request Management - user edits a request
custom_preconds: GIVEN that BOC/Club is viewing a Request Management popup
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on Actions
AND user clicks on Edit option
custom_expected:
THEN user can edit a request.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/20168)

title: BOC/Club - Request Management - user comments
custom_preconds: GIVEN that BOC/Club is viewing a Request Management popup
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on Actions
AND user clicks on Comment
OR user clicks on Comment icon
custom_expected:
THEN user can add a comment.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/20169)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/20170)

title: BOC/Club - Request Management - Action info icon popup
custom_preconds: GIVEN that BOC/Club is viewing a Request Management popup
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the info icon next to Actions
custom_expected:
THEN popup appears:
If a prospect declines a request, an explanation must be included to the clubs.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/20173)

title: BOC/Club - Request Management - Are You Sure popup
custom_preconds: GIVEN that BOC/Club is viewing a Request Management popup
custom_steps:
WHEN user edits or comments
AND user submits the form
custom_expected:
THEN an Are You Sure popup appears.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/20171)

title: BOC/Club - Request Management - confirmation popup
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that BOC/Club is viewing a Request Management popup
AND user has updated a request
custom_steps: WHEN user accepts the Are You Sure popup
custom_expected:
THEN a confirmation popup appears
AND user can click it closed.

title: BOC/Club chooses frequency of emails about Prospects' progress
custom_preconds: GIVEN that BOC/Club is on their Home page
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on their username
AND Medical File Uploads appears in the dropdown
AND user clicks on it
custom_expected:
THEN Update Frequency popup appears
AND user can choose different frequencies.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/20172)
